title: China approves Hengfeng Bank to boost its capital to 11.2 billion yuan
text:
China approves Hengfeng Bank to boost its capital to 11.2 billion yuan

Stock Markets 38 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 04:06AM ET)

© Reuters. China approves Hengfeng Bank to boost its capital to 11.2 billion yuan BEIJING (Reuters) - China's banking and insurance regulator said on Wednesday that it has approved the capital increase of Hengfeng Bank to 11.2 billion yuan ($1.59 billion) from 1.69 billion yuan. The statement, made by China's Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission (CBIRC) on its website, didn't dislose the source of bank's capital injection. Earlier this year, the country's sovereign fund China Investment Corp (CIC) said its unit will act as a strategic investor in the Shandong-based bank, as part of a state rescue initiative to support indebted smaller banks and contain financial risk.

China approves Hengfeng Bank to boost its capital to 11.2 billion yuan
description: China approves Hengfeng Bank to boost its capital to 11.2 billion yuan
